nodes.text: Ultimate Sticker Collection: Star Wars Rebels: Deadly Battles
Ultimate Sticker Collection: Star Wars Rebels: Deadly Battles is a sticker book from the series Star Wars Rebels with a focus on the program's third season. It was released on July 5, 2016.
DK's Ultimate Sticker Collection: Star Wars Rebels™: Deadly Battles is a fun companion to the popular animated series.

Star Wars Rebels is set between the events of Star Wars™: Episodes III and IV. Continuing the adventures of the galaxy's bravest rebels, the Ultimate Sticker Collection features over 1,000 colorful stickers depicting exciting Rebel adventures, thrilling battles, evil villains such as Darth Vader, and popular characters from the series including Ezra Bridger and his gang.
Create your own scenes with your favorite characters and learn more about what's to come in season 3 with the Ultimate Sticker Collection: Star Wars Rebels: Deadly Battles.
